item.title: 3d Printed Axidraw Easel Spacer
item.description:
Designing a Spacer for my AxiDraw Plotter

I have an AxiDraw V3/A3 Penplotter that I bought to satisfy a desire to own such a fantastic machine. It started in my teen years working with HP Plotters in our university lab at the TUHH. I could not afford an HP Plotter back in the day, so that desire was never satisfied.
